page.title: 11EVENTS
page.content: HOPE SHOW This is an annual show in August,a big undertaking for such a small scattered community.It has run for 4years and in 1983 attracted a record 2,000 attendance. The show has a full range of craft,cookery and horticultural competititions and field events such as dog,goat and ferret shows.There are childrens rides,sideshows and arena events such as theatre groups, country dancing and brass bands.It is held in the village hall and adjoining field. The show is run as an entertainment not a money raising venture, though the show does give the opportunity to local charities and voluntary groups to have stalls which boost funds for the church,youth clubs etc.A five a side fooball competition and clay pigeon shoot take place on the same day.
